name: Cubox (itch)
description:
SINCE I USE FREE EDITION OF CONSTRUCT, THE ONLY WAY TO PLAY THE GAME IS TO OPEN IT IN CONSTRUCT AND PLAY IT IN PREVIEW. THIS ALSO MEANS THAT YOU CAN ADD YOUR OWN ELEMENTS IN THE GAME. 

In Cubox, you can do things with cubes. That's it. There are eight types of cubes, which you can use. Here they are:

-Cube (Green cube) just a regular cube

-Resistant cube (Shield blocking a red cube) can't get affected by Bad cubes

-Bad cube (Red cube destroying a green one) destroys every cube except Resistant and Sticky.

-Virus cube (purple radioactivity symbol) will turn green ones into Virus ones

-Heal cube (Yellow cross) turns Virus cubes back to regular ones

-Invisible cube (White square) basically white cubes

-Roll cube (Circle arrow) Normal cubes with rotation animation

-Sticky cube (Purple cube stuck to red one) will stick to other cubes, but this don't work perfectly for now.

Move cubes with mouse, press big X button to delete all cubes and have fun!
